title: Hour 2 - Joey Chestnut Will Eat In Pain!
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Joey Chestnut Will Eat In Pain!
description:
Jason Smith & Mike Harmon fill in for Dan Patrick and the Danettes to wish you all a Happy 4th of July! The guys discuss the big weekend in sports and look ahead to Nathan’s Hot Dog Eating contest. Plus, a huge slate of MLB is ahead of the sports world while the guys continue to try and figure out the Kevin Durant drama. Plus, NFL Insider Jason La Canfora joins the guys!

 

 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
